languages.text: "Хм... А ты умеешь веселиться. Пожалуй, рассмотрю эту опцию. Слышишь, Комиссар? Что бы нам тебе пришить?"
"Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"
languages.original_text: "Хм... А ты умеешь веселиться. Пожалуй, рассмотрю эту опцию. Слышишь, Комиссар? Что бы нам тебе пришить?"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"
"Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"
"Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"
"Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"

languages.text: “嗯嗯……你可真是个会享受的人啊，或许我以后会听听你的建议。听到了吗，政委？你觉得我们应该给你缝些什么东西？”
languages.original_text: "Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"

traits.locale_text: “嗯嗯……你可真是个会享受的人啊，或许我以后会听听你的建议。听到了吗，政委？你觉得我们应该给你缝些什么东西？”

languages.text: «Mmm... Así que sí sabes disfrutar. A lo mejor me planteo tu sugerencia. ¿Has oído, Comisario? ¿Qué deberíamos coserte?».
languages.original_text: "Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"

traits.locale_text: «Mmm... Así que sí sabes disfrutar. A lo mejor me planteo tu sugerencia. ¿Has oído, Comisario? ¿Qué deberíamos coserte?».

languages.text: 「ほう…貴様もなかなかの趣味をしているな。悪くない提案だ。聞いたかね、コミッサー？今度は何を縫いつけてほしい？」
languages.original_text: "Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ほう…貴様もなかなかの趣味をしているな。悪くない提案だ。聞いたかね、コミッサー？今度は何を縫いつけてほしい？」

languages.text: "Hmm ... Ihr wisst also doch, wie man sich amüsiert. Vielleicht ziehe ich Euren Vorschlag in Erwägung. Habt Ihr gehört, Kommissar? Was sollen wir Euch annähen?"
languages.original_text: "Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm ... Ihr wisst also doch, wie man sich amüsiert. Vielleicht ziehe ich Euren Vorschlag in Erwägung. Habt Ihr gehört, Kommissar? Was sollen wir Euch annähen?"

languages.text: « Hmm... Vous savez donc prendre du bon temps. Je vais peut-être envisager votre suggestion. Vous avez entendu, commissaire ? Qu'est-ce qu'on pourrait bien vous coudre ? »
languages.original_text: "Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Vous savez donc prendre du bon temps. Je vais peut-être envisager votre suggestion. Vous avez entendu, commissaire ? Qu'est-ce qu'on pourrait bien vous coudre ? »

languages.text: "Hımm... Eğlenmeyi biliyormuşsun demek. Belki tavsiyeni değerlendiririm. Duydun mu Komiser? Ne dikelim bedenine?"
languages.original_text: "Hmm... So you do know how to enjoy yourself. Maybe I'll look into your suggestion. Hear that, Commissar? What should we sew on you?"

traits.locale_text: "Hımm... Eğlenmeyi biliyormuşsun demek. Belki tavsiyeni değerlendiririm. Duydun mu Komiser? Ne dikelim bedenine?"
